text: Valentin Mikhailovich Arbakov (28 January 1952 – 30 November 2003) was a Russian chess Grandmaster. In 1981, he shared first place in that year's Moscow City Chess Championship together with Andrei Sokolov.http://www.chessnc.com/biography/person-55.html He was known for his skills in blitz chess.http://www.themoscowtimes.com/sitemap/free/2003/4/article/searching-for- a-blitz-legend-at-sokolniki/239338.html ==References== ==External links== *Valentin Arbakov chess games at 365Chess.com * Category:1952 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Soviet chess players Category:Russian chess players Category:20th-century chess players
title: Valentin Arbakov
